DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine effectiveness novel Wellness Action Plan aim 1 ) improve parent recall diet activity plan 2 ) increase follow-through plan 3 ) aid parent identify child 's weight category .
DOC.brief_title: Wellness Action Plan Trial Addressing Childhood Obesity
DOC.criteria: Children age 2.5 14 year , regardless baseline BMI Presented well child visit pediatric clinic serve primarily Medicaidinsured child Milwaukee , Wisconsin Patients foster care Parents patient nonEnglish speaking Patients see specialist weight management .
